name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience executing CI/CD pipelines, container orchestration, and cloud services optimization. Proficient in **AWS**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Terraform**, I ensure seamless deployment and infrastructure management for high-availability applications. My expertise extends to monitoring and observability tools such as **DataDog**, **Grafana**, and **Prometheus**, allowing for real-time performance insights and infrastructure health checks.

Skilled in scripting with **Python** and **Bash**, I automate workflows and enhance operational efficiency. With hands-on experience in configuration management using **Ansible** and keen database management skills in **PostgreSQL**, I support scalable and secure application environments. I excel in leveraging **Kafka** for real-time data processing, integrating systems, and enhancing application performance. My background in full-stack development complements my DevOps capabilities, enabling me to bridge the gap between development and operations seamlessly.
